Questions: Bocho anaogelea(A) au anatembea chini ya bahari(B)?
English translation: Frogfishes swim(A) or walk on the bottom of the sea(B)?

Questions: Chale ni hatari. Kweli(A) au sio kweli(B).
English translation: Lion fishes are dangerous. True(A) or false(B).

Questions: Chamvi ni mtoto wa kipepeo. Kweli(A) au sio kweli(B).
English translation: The caterpillar is the offsping of the butterfly. True(A) or not true(B).

Questions: Dawa gani inatumika kwa kuua chepu, msinduzi(A) au tonga mwuitu(B)?
English translation: Which plant is a good medicine to kill fly larvae, msindu(A) or forest tonga(B)?

Questions: Chewa ana meno mengi(A) au hana meno(B)?
English translation: Groupers have many(A) or no(B) teeth?

Questions: Maji yanapotoka, zinapatikana kungugu(A) au chowe(B) ufukweni?
English translation: When the tide is low, can you find cowrie shells or razor shelld on the beach?

Questions: Mti gani ni bau mzuri kwa kutengeneza dau, mgulele(A) au mkarati(B)?
English translation: Which wood is good to build boats, mgulele(A) or mkarati(B)?

Questions: Kamba anaweza kuogelea baharini. Kweli(A) au sio kweli(B).
English translation: Shrimps can swim in the sea. True(A) or false(B).

Questions: Kambare anaweza kuogelea baharini(A) au mtoni tu(B)?
English translation: Can catfishes swim in the sea(A) or only in the river(B)?

Questions: Kasa anasafiri msimu kuja Pemba, kaskazi(A) au kusi(B).
English translation: Sea turtles travel in the cold(A) or hot season(B)?

Questions: Kasa anarudi kwa kutaga ufukweni kila miezi sita(A) au miaka moja-miwili(B)?
English translation: Do sea turtles return to their beach every six months(A) or one-two years(B)?

Questions: Kichachuli ni mtoto wa tumbili(A) au wa paa(B)?
English translation: Kichachuli is the offspring of the vervet monkey(A) or of the civet(B)?

Questions: Kijimbi msitu anakula wadudu(A) au samaki(B)?
English translation: Do kingfishers eat insects(A) or fish(B)?

Questions: Nani anakula koa, ngawa (A) au chonjwe(B)?
English translation: Who eats snails, the civet(A) or the mongoose(B)?

Questions: Koho anakula nyama. Kweli(A) au sio kweli(B)?
English translation: Do vultures eat meat(A) or fruits(B)?

Questions: Komba analala usiku(A) au mchana(B)?
English translation: Bushbabies sleep at night(A) or during the day(B)?

Questions: Komba, anapokula ndizi,  anakula moja tu(A) au anaharibu ndizi zote(B)?
English translation: Bushbabies, when eating bananas, eat one at a time(A) or they ruin the whole batch(B)?

Questions: Mwenda (tumbili pevu/koogwe) anaishi na wajukuu wake(A) peke yake(B)?
English translation: The territorial vervet monkey male lives with his grandchildren(A) or by himself(B)?

Questions: Chaza (A) au tondoo(B) ni ngumu kwa kubanja?
English translation: Chaza(A) or tondoo(B) is hard to kubanja?

Questions: Mbaazi(A) au maharage(B) ni mti ya kutambaa?
English translation: Mbaazi(A) or beans(B) is a vine?

Questions: Matunda gani yanazaliwa mara moja kwa mwaka, korosho(A) au zambarau(B)?
English translation: Which fruit is produced once a year, mkorosho(A) or java plums(B)?

Questions: Mbiliwili anasafiri mpaka ulaya, kweli(A) au sio kweli(B).
English translation: Swifts travel to Europe. True(A) or false(B)?

Questions: Mgulele anafanya matunda kama mzambarau(A) au kama stafeli(B)?
English translation: The mgulele tree makes fruits that resemble java plums(A) or custard apples(B)?

Questions: Churambo(A) au Toondo(B) anaishi katikati mikandaa?
English translation: Helmet shells(A) or mud whelks(B) live in between the mangroves?

Questions: Minazi gani inaishi kwa muda mrefu zaidi, za kilimo(A) au za kawaida(B)?
English translation: Which coconut lives a longer life, the cultivation one(A) or the normal one(B)?

Questions: Mjafari unatumika kama dawa mzizi(A) au majani(B)?
English translation: Of the plant mjafari, the roots(A) or the leaves(B) are used as medicine?

Questions: Mjusi anaweza kuwa rangi gani, nyeupe(A) au kijani(B)?
English translation: Geckos can be which color, white(A) or green(B)?

Questions: Mkuu wa usiku unatumika kama dawa ya kichwa(A) au mshipa(B)?
English translation: Mkuu wa usiko is used as a medicine for the head(A) or the stomach(B)?

Questions: Msimu gani ni msimu nzuri kwa mwani: Kaskazi(A) au Masika(B)?
English translation: Which season is good for cultivating seaweed, long dry season(A) or long rainy season(B)?

Questions: Ndizi gani ni nzuri kwa kupikwa, mkono wa tembo(A) au pukusa(B)?
English translation: Which banana is good for cooking, mkono wa tembo(A) or kukusa(B)?

Questions: Nduaro anaweza kuwa kubwa kama ngombe(A) au kama mtoto(B)?
English translation: Tunas reach the size of a cow(A) or of a child(B)?

Questions: Ngawa anakula magonda ya mchikichi. Kweli(A) au sio kweli(B).
English translation: Civets eat the meat of oil nuts. True(A) or false(B).

Questions: Akiogopa, ngisi anazalisha kivi. Kweli(A) au sio kweli(B)?
English translation: When scared, the squid releases ink. True(A) or false(B).

Questions: Nyangumi anasafiri Pemba kwa kuzaa(A) au kwa kupumzika tu(B)?
English translation: Whales travel to Pemba to give birth(A) or to rest(B)?

Questions: Msimu gani ni msimu nzuri kwa panga: mwanza(A) au nusu(B) wa mwezi?
English translation: Which period is good for panga: beginning(A) or mid(B) moon?

Questions: Kwa mara moja, papa anazaa watoto kama watano(A) au hamsini(B)?
English translation: Per single event, do sharks give birth to about five(A) or fifty(B) offspring?

Questions: Papa gani ni mkali, nyambrani(A) au charawanzi(B)?
English translation: Which shark is dangerous, nyambrani(A) or charawanzi(B)?

Questions: Pelele anakaa chini tu(A) au anapanda miti pia(B)?
English translation: Do hyraxes stay on the floor only(A) or climb trees as well(B)?

Questions: Pelele hana vidole(A) au ana vidole vitatu(B) ?
English translation: Hyraxes have no fingers(A) or have three fingers(B)?

Questions: Watoto wa pomboo wananyonya. Kweli(A) au sio kweli(B).
English translation: The offspring of dolphins drink milk. True(A) or false(B).

Questions: Popo gani anatumia masikio kwa kuruka, popo kubwa(A) au popo mgomba(B)?
English translation: Which bat uses its ears to fly, flying fox(A) or banana bat(B)?

Questions: Popo anataga mayai (A) au anazaa(B)?
English translation: Do bats make eggs(A) or give birth(B)?

Questions: Popo anatoa uchafu kupitia njia ya mdomu. Kweli(A) au sio kweli(B).
English translation: Bats produce excrements out of their mouth. True(A) or false(B)?

Questions: Pweza anauliwa kwa bunduzi(A) au nyavu(B)?
English translation: The octopus is fished with fishing spears(A) or with nets(B)?

Questions: Salile anataga msimu wa mvuli(A) au masika(B)?
English translation: Ducks lay eggs in the short(A) or long(B) rainy season?

Questions: Taa analala katikati macheme(A) au sehemu ya topetope(B)?
English translation: Rays sleep between the corals(A) or in the muddy patches(B)?

Questions: Ukukwi ni hatari. Kweli(A) au sio kweli(B).
English translation: Green spotted snakes are dangerous. True (A) or false(B).

Questions: Miti ulaya anakua katika mpaka ya msitu (A) au kituo ya msitu(B) ?
English translation: The mti ya ulaya tree grows in the forest border(A) or in its center(B)?

Questions: Baada ya kupanda viazi, unasubiri miezi miwili(A) au minne(B) kwa kuvila?
English translation: After planting sweet potatoes, two(A) or four months(B) are needed before harvesting?

Questions: Vijinu vina sumu. Kweli(A) au sio kweli(B).
English translation: Cone shells have venom. True(A) or false(B).
